channel.name: CBBC UK
channel.title: Ricky Wilson's Art Jam
channel.desc: Radio 1 DJ Nick ?Grimmy? Grimshaw visits the Art Jam studio to show Ricky three items that mean the world to him - a colourful Keith Haring print, a picture of a Paris bridge wrapped in gold fabric and a special Damien Hirst album cover. While chatting to Ricky, Nick shares amazing stories about being a DJ, the celebrities he has met, his lifelong love of art and his two beloved dogs.
